span: Rocky, a young man, seeks power and wealth in order to fulfil a promise to his dying mother. His quest takes him to Mumbai, where he gets involved with the notorious gold mafia.
A labourer named Pushpa makes enemies as he rises in the world of red sandalwood smuggling. However, violence erupts when the police attempt to bring down his illegal business.

In college, Farhan and Raju form a great bond with Rancho due to his refreshing outlook. Years later, a bet gives them a chance to look for their long-lost friend whose existence seems rather elusive.
M S Dhoni, a boy from Ranchi, aspires to play cricket for India. Though he initially tries to please his father by working for the Indian Railways, he ultimately decides to chase his dreams.

Vikram Vedha is a 2022 Indian Hindi-language neo-noir action thriller film written-directed by Pushkar–Gayathri, based on their 2017 Tamil film of the same name and also inspired by the Indian folktale Baital Pachisi.
After reading the letter her mother had written for her before she died, Anjali decides to bring together her widowed father, Rahul, with his true love who is also named Anjali.
Friends Kabir, Imran and Arjun take a vacation in Spain before Kabir's marriage. The trip turns into an opportunity to mend fences, heal wounds, fall in love with life and combat their worst fears
When the disappearance of a policewoman's son threatens to ruin Vijay's family, he leaves no stone unturned in order to shield his family.
Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler, decides to fulfil his dream of winning a gold medal for his country by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite the existing social stigmas
An innocent alien lands on Earth but loses his communication device. He meets Jaggu, a heartbroken reporter, and tries to find his device. With time, he raises many thought-provoking questions.

Ishaan is criticised by his parents for his poor academic performance and is sent away to a boarding school. Ram, an art teacher, however, realises he has dyslexia and helps him uncover his potential.

h3: Boston Dynamics leads call to stop arming robots – will anyone listen?
span: A group of robot-makers led by Boston Dynamics has pledged to push back on any attempts to add weapons to their creations

h3: Meta’s text-to-audio AI can create common sounds and generate music
span: Meta’s AudioGen text-to-audio artificial intelligence model could create sound for video games, film soundtracks or music production

h3: Nutrient-measuring device could make microwaves that count calories
span: Scientists have found a way to use leaked electromagnetic radiation to measure nutrients in microwaved meals

h3: Sci-fi author Neal Stephenson wants to build a metaverse open to all
span: The science-fiction author who coined the term metaverse in his 1992 novel Snow Crash is going head-to-head with Meta

h3: Who should own the copyright on AI-generated artwork?
span: Artificial intelligences can create images inspired by the human-generated art they train on. This is raising concerns over copyright and artists’ livelihoods

h3: Ethereum Merge: What will the radical update mean for cryptocurrency?
span: The electricity consumption of the Ethereum cryptocurrency rivals that of some countries, but a controversial update to how it works will slash this by 99

h3: Apps used as alternatives to prison in US found to have privacy flaws
span: An analysis of 16 apps used as alternatives to incarceration found numerous privacy problems including in an app used to track almost 248,000 immigrants

h3: Tory leadership contest's online vote is still vulnerable to hackers
span: Hacking concerns continue to dog the online Conservative party vote, which will decide next UK prime minister – should online voting even be used in such situations?

h3: Big Tech and Civil War enthusiasts clash over historic US battlefields
span: Northern Virginia is home to many American Civil War battlefield sites as well as the largest concentration of data centres in the world. Plans for more

h3: People trust AI to make big decisions – as long as a human checks them
span: Artificial intelligences are increasingly making important decisions that affect our lives, but people consider the calls made to be fairer and more acceptable

h3: Emissions from mining a single bitcoin have increased 126-fold
span: Between 2016 and 2021, the carbon emissions associated with mining bitcoin have increased from 0.9 tonnes to 113 tonnes per coin

h3: Computer made from swirly magnets can recognise handwritten digits
span: A prototype computer built using a magnetic material called a skyrmion has been programmed to recognise handwritten digits. The approach could

article-content: Philosophy of technology is a branch of philosophy that studies the practice of designing and creating artifacts, and the nature of the things so created. It emerged as a discipline over the past two centuries, and has grown considerably since the 1970s. The humanities philosophy of technology is concerned with the meaning of technology for, and its impact on, society and culture. Initially, technology was seen as an extension of the human organism that replicated or amplified bodily and mental faculties. Marx framed it as a tool used by capitalists to oppress the proletariat, but believe technology would be a fundamentally liberating force once it was freed from societal deformations.Second-wave philosophers like Ortega later shifted their focus from economics and politics to  life and living in a techno-material culture, arguing that technology could oppress even the bourgeoisie who were its ostensible masters and protectors. Third-stage philosophers like Don Ihde and Albert Borgmann represent a turn toward de-generalization and empiricism, and considered how humans can learn to live with technology.

span: The Autobots, a faction of robots from the planet Cybertron, are hunted down by an elite CIA black ops unit and a ruthless bounty hunter. They turn to a struggling inventor and his daughter for help.
Tired of Chris's professional failures, his wife decides to separate, leaving him financially broke with an unpaid internship in a brokerage firm and his son's custody to deal with.
After his father's death, T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to inherit his throne. However, a powerful enemy related to his family threatens to attack his nation.
John Wick, a retired hitman, is forced to return to his old ways after a group of Russian gangsters steal his car and kill a puppy gifted to him by his late wife.
US agent Luke Hobbs and British mercenary Deckard Shaw are forced to put their rivalry side and work together to stop a genetically enhanced supervillain.
When a group of time travellers from the future tell people about a war they are fighting with aliens, Dan, a school teacher, decides to help them win it in order to secure his daughter's future.
Thor sets out on a journey to defeat Malekith, the leader of the Dark Elves when he returns to Asgard to retrieve a dangerous weapon and fulfill his desire of destroying the Nine Realms.
Aladdin, a kind thief, woos Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah, with the help of Genie. When Jafar, the grand vizier, tries to usurp the king, Jasmine, Aladdin and Genie must stop him from succeeding.
A young hobbit, Frodo, who has found the One Ring that belongs to the Dark Lord Sauron, begins his journey with eight companions to Mount Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed.
Rocky trains his friend Apollo Creed in a match against Drago, an indestructible Russian boxer. But when Apollo is killed in the ring during the match, Rocky vows to avenge his friend's death.

Optimus Prime, known in Japan as Convoy, is a fictional character created by the Transformers franchise. He is a Cybertronian, a fictional extraterrestrial species of sentient self-configuring modular robotic lifeforms

Thomas Cruise Mapother IV, known professionally as Tom Cruise, is an American actor and producer. One of the world's highest-paid actors, he has received various accolades, including an Honorary Palme d'Or and three Golden Globe Awards
